Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Dan's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Dan joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . As the Wolves invade Alexandria, ransacking homes and murdering residents, Dan attempts to seek shelter inside a home. However, a Wolf chasing him knocks him down inside the front door and stabs him in the chest, killing him. His body is later dragged outside the house and further mutilated by another Wolf. The next day, Dan's body is gathered by Tobin and Bruce and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. His name is then added to the memorial wall by Betsy and two other women .
Death[]: Killed By Aaron (Indirectly Caused) Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria. The Wolves As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Dan is one of the many residents to be killed.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Dan has killed: Possibly numerous amounts of zombies
Trivia[]: The names written on the memory wall corresponded to the filming of each death scene in "JSS." With this being said, John D. Ross' character is Dan. Similar to how the recurring extras killed off in "JSS" got their names, many of the stunt people who portrayed Alexandrians killed by the Wolves were named based off the first letter of their real name, such as Dan and John D. Ross. John Ross also portrayed an unnamed survivor in Season 4.
Name: Dan
